activities: Global Response may utilize systems hosted on EU-based servers. In addition, we may interact with our European clients' customers via phone, email, chat, or social media, or EU-based customers on behalf of EU and/or non-EU clients via similar channels. Customers' sensitive personal information is generally not hosted/stored by Global Response. For limited cases where we do handle these type of data, including cases where the information is processed by Global Response but not hosted/stored, all actions are undertaken according to applicable industry standards, including PCI DSS and HIPAA.
eucountries: Austria, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data processed by Global Response within the Safe Harbor framework generally falls under the category of customer data. Some of this data is manually processed, and all data is processed in compliance with US PCI DSS and/or HIPAA standards.
recoursemech: Global Response will cooperate and comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) to investigate unresolved complaints and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
